description:
Usagi finally confesses to Rei that she’s been unable to get in touch with Mamoru for the past several months. Meanwhile, the Three Lights publicly announce their intention to disband their group...
Source: hulu

titles.title: La muerte de la princesa Kakiuh. Aparece Galaxia.
Princess Kakyu Perishes: Advent of Galaxia
火球皇女消滅! ギャラクシア降臨
